snippet: A series of attacks have damaged at least 31 cellphone towers operated by all the major providers in Nigeria, further straining communication in a country with nearly no landlines.
abstract: Series of attacks have damaged at least 31 cellphone towers operated by all the major providers in Nigeria, further straining communication in a country with few landlines.
lead_paragraph: A series of attacks have damaged at least 31 cellphone towers operated by all the major providers in Nigeria, further straining communication in a country with nearly no landlines.
